nolspotlex.v1
Class Item

java.lang.Object
  nolspotlex.v1.Item

public class Item
extends java.lang.Object

This class is part of the "World of NolsPotLex" application. "World of NolsPotLex" is a very simple, text based adventure game. A "item" represents a device that you can be used in the scenery of the game.

Version:
2011.10.25
Author:
Alexandre Boursier & Nolan Potier
